headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 6 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 6 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 4 critical, 25 high, 5 medium, 5 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 26 other bases. 5 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK). Network hotspots: Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and 1 others. Primary drivers: cold‑temperature performance penalties, low cloud base and mist. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 6 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Sibiu (SBZ/LRSB) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 150 m, RVR down to 550 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 1.5 km, cloud base around 100 ft | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties and 23 others. Worst affected now: Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ) — CRIT: fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 100 m, RVR down to 450 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: freezing fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, very low visibility) | David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO) — CRIT: strong gusts risk (drivers: operational constraints). Changed since last run: Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP), David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Memmingen Allgau (FMM/EDJA), London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) and 2 others.
